overview: Rosa is told by her father that she must marry a man from her own clan. She refuses, and vows to marry the first man she meets. That man is Antonio, who is from a hated clan. Antonio is in love with Rosa, although she hates him. Despite this, she keeps her vow and marries him.
tagline: A rose of old Italy, transplanted to American soil, there to bloom and flame, hate and love, in the intense old world manner.
title: Little Italy
